long_description: Wear the windproof, water-resistant Patagonia Nano Puff as an insulating or outer layer in cold climates. It's made with incredibly lightweight and compressible insulation that warms even when wet. 60g PrimaLoft One insulation provides excellent warmth and compressibility and will continue to insulate even in damp conditions. Lightweight ripstop recycled polyester shell fabric has a Durable Water Repellent finish; horizontal quilting pattern along side panels uses durable, abrasion-resistant thread. Center-front zipper has wicking interior storm flap and zipper garage at chin for next-to-skin comfort. Zip handwarmer pockets; zippered internal chest pocket doubles as self-stuff sack with a reinforced carabiner clip-in loop. Patagonia Nano Puff jacket has a regular fit and hem drawcord.
short_description: Wear the windproof, water-resistant Patagonia Nano Puff as an insulating or outer layer in cold climates. It's made with incredibly lightweight and compressible insulation that warms even when wet.
